links.title: Tolkien Gateway
links.info: – the world’s largest Tolkien encyclopaedia.

links.title: The Mythgard Institute
links.info: – Online Tolkien and Tolkien-related courses taught by some of the leading Tolkien scholars.

links.title: The Tolkien Professor
links.info: – a series of Tolkien podcasts by the Tolkien Professor, Corey Olsen.

links.title: John Garth
links.info: – news and articles from the author of Tolkien and the Great War, with access to his blog

links.title: Dimitra Fimi
links.info: – news and blog from the author of Tolkien, Race and Cultural History

links.title: The Lord of the Rings Project
links.info: – a genealogy of characters in Tolkien’s mythology, along with many innovative ways of analysing the books

links.title: Tolkien Brasil
links.info: – a Portuguese website for Tolkien fans in Brasil

links.title: The Encyclopedia of Arda
links.info: – a large Tolkien encyclopaedia put together by Mark Fisher

links.title: Sarehole Mill
links.info: – the website of the Birmingham Mill that inspired Tolkien in his youth.

links.title: Waymeet
links.info: – a online journal with resources to help teachers when teaching classes about Tolkien

links.title: The Elvish Linguistic Fellowship
links.info: – includes linguistics resources and information on their publications

links.title: TolkLang
links.info: – a mailing list for those interested in Tolkien languages

links.title: Gwaith-i-Phethdain
links.info: – the Fellowship of the Wordsmiths

links.title: Ardalambion
links.info: – a comprehensive site with essays and wordlists on Tolkien’s invented languages, with an especial focus on Quenya

links.title: Åke Bertenstam’s Tolkien Page
links.info: – includes a chronological bibliography of Tolkien’s works and books about Tolkien

links.title: Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull
links.info: – two premier Tolkien scholars

links.title: Tolkien Library
links.info: – a website about collecting Tolkien books

links.title: TolkienBooks.net
links.info: – aims to list all British editions of Tolkien publications

links.title: J.R.R. Tolkien: A Collection
links.info: – an individual’s large Tolkien collection with photographs

links.title: The J.R.R. Tolkien Collection at Marquette University
links.info: – Marquette holds Tolkien’s original manuscripts of The Hobbit, The Lord of the Rings, Farmer Giles of Ham and other writings

links.title: Marion E. Wade Center
links.info: – the organisation in possession of Tolkien’s desk and an assortment of his letters and manuscripts

links.title: University of Leeds Special Collections
links.info: – Leeds University holds a collection of correspondence between Tolkien and E. V. Gordon

links.title: The Mythopoeic Society
links.info: – a non-profit international literary and educational organisation, based in the United States, for the study and enjoyment of fantasy and mythic literature, especially the works of J.R.R. Tolkien, C.S. Lewis, and Charles Williams and other Inklings.

links.title: The Charles Williams Society
links.info: – Charles Williams was a member of the Inklings

links.title: Österreichischen Tolkiengesellschaft
links.info: – The Austrian Tolkien Society

links.title: Minas Tirith
links.info: – the Cambridge Tolkien Society, with free online access to their journal, Anor

links.title: Almarenska družina
links.info: – The Croatian Association of Tolkien Fans

links.title: Společnost Přátel Díla Pana JRR Tolkiena
links.info: – The Czech Tolkien Society

links.title: Bri
links.info: – The Danish Tolkien Society

links.title: Unquendor
links.info: – The Dutch Tolkien Society

links.title: Suomen Tolkien Seura
links.info: – The Finnish Tolkien Society

links.title: Elanor – Het Tolkien Genootschap
links.info: – The Flemish Tolkien Society

links.title: Tolkiendil
links.info: – The Tolkien Society of France

links.title: Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft
links.info: – The German Tolkien Society

links.title: The Prancing Pony
links.info: – Greek Tolkien Society

links.title: Società Tolkieniana Italiana
links.info: – The Italian Tolkien Society

links.title: The Tolkien Society
links.info: - an educational charity, literary society, and international fan club, devoted to promoting the life and works of J.R.R. Tolkien.

links.title: University of Wisconsin Tolkien and Fantasy Society
links.info: - (USA)

links.title: University of Wisconsin Tolkien and Fantasy Society
links.info: - (Russia)
